description: A tabbed SSH solution for Windows, combining PuTTY/KiTTY, WinSCP and VcXsrv
post_install: if (Test-Path "$(appdir putty)\current\putty.exe") { cmd /c mklink /h "$dir\tools\putty.exe" "$(appdir putty)\current\putty.exe" } else { Write-Output "Error: putty.exe not found"; }

if (Test-Path "$(appdir putty)\current\pageant.exe") { cmd /c mklink /h "$dir\tools\pageant.exe" "$(appdir putty)\current\pageant.exe" } else { Write-Output "Warning: putty's pageant.exe not found"; }
if (Test-Path "$(appdir putty)\current\plink.exe") { cmd /c mklink /h "$dir\tools\plink.exe" "$(appdir putty)\current\plink.exe" } else { Write-Output "Warning: putty's plink.exe not found"; }
if (Test-Path "$(appdir winscp)\current\WinSCP.exe") { cmd /c mklink /j "$dir\tools\WinSCP" "$(appdir winscp)\current" } else { Write-Output "Note: Install WinSCP for File Transfer support"; }
if (Test-Path "$(appdir vcxsrv)\current\vcxsrv.exe") { cmd /c mklink /j "$dir\tools\VcXsrv" "$(appdir vcxsrv)\current" } else { Write-Output "Note: Install VcXsrv for X-Server support"; }
